** 5 《公冶長篇第五》

5.1子謂公冶長，¶
「可妻也。¶

# src: LY 05.02; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-2a>¶
5.2子謂南容，¶
「邦有道，不廢；¶	KR1a0029_008:8a:4:13:14,KR1c0012_034:9b:5:8:0,KR1c0041_019:52b:1:19:65,KR1d0087_163:29b:3:9:41,KR1d0087_165:16b:4:26:4,KR1d0087_165:16b:5:12:4,KR1d0088_003:1b:6:18:2,KR1d0088_003:1b:7:4:2,KR1g0009_003:1a:7:13:2,KR1h0004_005:2a:2:1:1,KR1h0005_003:1a:5:5:0,KR1h0006_003:2a:6:5:6,KR1h0006_003:2a:8:24:6,KR1h0007_005:1b:9:5:6,KR1h0007_005:2a:2:26:6,KR1h0007_011:3b:2:29:8,KR1h0012_003:1a:8:7:4,KR1h0012_003:14a:4:9:40,KR1h0015_003:1a:11:33:4,KR1h0017_005:1b:4:7:6,KR1h0017_011:9a:6:6:40,KR1h0020_001:28a:8:7:145,KR1h0021_000:50a:8:7:230,KR1h0024_008:1b:1:24:4,KR1h0026_003:1a:8:8:4,KR1h0028_006:2a:5:5:8,KR1h0032_000:6b:7:5:67,KR1h0032_004:1a:9:5:5,KR1h0032_004:2a:5:10:6,KR1h0034_006:2a:4:5:8,KR1h0038_007:1b:10:5:8,KR1h0039_003:32b:5:12:174,KR1h0043_005:2a:6:5:7,KR2a0009_092:15b:2:20:5,KR2b0007_053:13b:7:14:5,KR2b0037_023:52a:6:35:0,KR2d0005_032:26a:2:8:1,KR2d0006_128:55b:1:18:1,KR2h0002_016:3a:1:5:5,KR2k0008_023:37a:5:9:8,KR2o0020_021:44b:7:14:97,KR3a0059_029:38a:1:5:2,KR3a0059_034:27a:7:5:2,KR3a0078_061:21a:3:9:16,KR3j0126_001:21a:8:15:6,KR3j0126_001:21b:1:4:6,KR3j0132_004:15b:5:5:1,KR3k0008_019:14b:2:3:7,KR3k0012_541:1a:6:9:5,KR3k0012_999:1a:6:9:12374,KR3k0013_853:6a:2:3:2,KR3k0023_107:5b:4:7:6,KR3k0030_026:4a:3:11:3,KR3k0030_060:8b:4:6:3,KR3k0046_025:37b:3:9:9,KR3k0050_109:25b:6:17:24,KR3k0055_256:8b:2:3:5,KR3k0056_118:36a:2:9:2,KR3k0058_086:5b:1:33:3,KR4d0040_063:4a:9:2993:81,KR4d0266_091:6a:5:12:3,KR4d0398_020:15b:5:5:1,KR4d0418_004:12b:2:5:2,KR4d0418_004:12b:7:15:2,KR4e0070_060:18b:5:8:23,KR5h0033_036:002a:1:13:2,KR5h0033_040:001b:1:14:2

<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-3a>¶
5.3子謂子賤，¶

5.4子貢問曰：¶

子曰：¶
「女、器也。」¶
曰：¶
「何器也？」¶
曰：¶
「瑚璉也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-5a>¶

# src: LY 05.07; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-7a>¶
5.7子曰：¶
「道不行，¶

「求也，¶

「賜也

子曰：¶
「賜也，¶
非爾所及也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-15a>¶	KR1g0009_003:4b:7:3:2,KR1h0004_005:7a:64:1:12,KR1h0005_003:5a:5:1:0,KR1h0006_003:10a:8:10:15,KR1h0006_003:10b:2:9:15,KR1h0007_005:9a:6:9:15,KR1h0007_005:9a:8:42:15,KR1h0012_003:8a:2:3:21,KR1h0012_003:8b:1:6:22,KR1h0015_003:4b:6:5:4,KR1h0017_005:19a:1:3:60,KR1h0017_005:19a:7:4:61,KR1h0019_003:73b:4:18:327,KR1h0020_001:31a:9:3:159,KR1h0021_000:54b:6:3:248,KR1h0024_008:7a:3:13:4,KR1h0026_003:7a:9:3:26,KR1h0028_006:15b:4:4:39,KR1h0034_006:12b:5:4:40,KR1h0036_004:11b:8:4:28,KR1h0038_007:9b:2:4:39,KR1h0039_001:28a:1:18:121,KR1h0043_005:17a:6:4:39,KR2c0021_019:31b:1:32:1,KR2c0021_106:19a:6:17:1,KR2d0006_191:36b:4:5:42,KR2d0006_213:15a:2:4:3,KR2d0015_011:18a:4:4:1,KR2d0023_006:14b:1:6:2,KR2d0023_008:14a:6:16:4,KR2d0023_051:21a:8:15:39,KR2d0024_085:42a:3:13:5,KR2i0005_009:8b:1:2:4,KR2i0005_050:7a:1:16:4,KR2i0021_082:8b:3:2:2,KR2k0049_153:28b:8:8:5,KR2o0017_008:4a:7:1:2,KR3a0003_002:11b:7:4:1,KR3a0007_015:14b:8:9:4,KR3a0007_020:14b:8:9:90,KR3a0014_003:1a:5:8:4,KR3a0014_005:3b:10:13:0,KR3a0030_018:62b:4:8:2,KR3a0031_007:5b:6:5:2,KR3a0054_001:38b:7:8:9,KR3a0059_006:72a:3:3:3,KR3a0059_029:6b:4:3:2,KR3j0003_001:11a:1:6:2,KR3j0012_001:12b:3:19:1,KR3j0013_004:8b:8:12:5,KR3j0039_005:12b:1:15:7,KR3j0039_005:12b:3:13:7,KR3j0051_003:19b:5:20:0,KR3j0076_003:24b:7:1:2,KR3j0082_018:3a:1:10:2,KR3k0003_078:3b:6:11:1,KR3k0013_791:14a:5:10:2,KR3k0013_853:9b:4:11:2,KR3k0013_860:16b:3:13:2,KR3k0025_076:19a:6:4:11,KR3k0030_001:14b:5:35:6,KR3k0041_009:24a:7:5:71,KR3k0046_082:23a:7:5:4,KR3k0046_091:45a:5:5:10,KR3k0054_010:23a:7:30:2,KR3k0055_323:30b:8:7:8,KR3k0056_090:46a:6:30:2,KR3k0058_129:9a:7:33:2,KR3l0075_001:45b:7:2:47,KR3l0075_003:50a:6:7:44,KR4d0070_040:26b:2:11:22,KR4d0306_025:9a:9:9:6,KR4d0401_003:26a:6:6:14,KR4d0466_005:22b:2:13:8,KR4e0215_003:1a:2:32473:623,KR4e0215_003:17a:3:17181:91,KR4e0215_005:1a:2:32473:583,KR4e0215_005:13b:0:101:51,KR4e0215_008:1a:2:32473:522,KR4e0215_030:48a:0:42:115,KR4f0030_122:4b:7:13:2,KR5a0306_001:006a:8:1:45,KR5a0308_003 5.14子路有聞，¶

<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-17a>¶
5.15子貢問曰：¶

子曰：¶

『文』也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-18a>¶

# src: LY 05.16; tr. CH
5.16子謂子產，¶

# src: LY 05.19:02; tr. CH
子曰：¶
「忠矣。」¶
曰：¶
「仁矣乎？」¶
曰：¶
「未知；¶
焉得仁？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-22a>¶

# src: LY 05.19:03; tr. CH
「崔子弒齊君，¶	KR1h0004_005:17a:37:1:21

何如？」¶

# src: LY 05.19:04; tr. CH
子曰：¶
「清矣。」¶
曰：¶
「仁矣乎？」¶
曰：¶
「未知；¶
焉得仁？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-23a>¶

# src: LY 05.20; tr. CH
5.20季文子三思而後行。¶
子聞之，¶
曰：¶
「再，¶
斯可矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-24a>¶

則知；¶
邦無道，¶
則愚。¶

# src: LY 05.26:01; tr. CH
5.26顏淵季路侍。¶
子曰：¶

# src: LY 05.26:02; tr. CH

# src: LY 05.27; tr. CH
5.27子曰：¶
「已矣乎！¶
吾未見能見其過	KR1a0014_003:45a:8:5:5,KR1a0041_069:45a:3:10:0,KR1a0092_009:83b:3:8:12,KR1a0095_009:40a:5:12:3,KR1a0102_006:23b:6:12:0,KR1a0139_079:49b:4:10:483,KR1b0007_001:37a:1:10:18,KR1b0011_001:30a:3:11:1,KR1e0039_011:5a:3:9:6,KR1g0009_003:9b:8:6:2,KR1h0004_005:17a:108:1:31,KR1h0005_003:10a:1:5:0,KR1h0006_003:20a:1:6:27,KR1h0007_005:18b:5:6:29,KR1h0012_003:17b:3:6:49,KR1h0012_008:9b:8:14:27,KR1h0015_003:9a:6:3:4,KR1h0017_005:44a:7:6:156,KR1h0020_001:36a:7:6:181,KR1h0021_000:61a:5:6:276,KR1h0024_008:15a:1:2:4,KR1h0026_003:15b:1:6:55,KR1h0028_006:33a:7:6:74,KR1h0030_006:6a:1:16:5,KR1h0034_006:28a:3:6:75,KR1h0036_004:20b:10:10:48,KR1h0036_004:21a:4:1:48,KR1h0038_007:21b:7:6:75,KR1h0039_004:47a:4:15:197,KR1h0043_005:42b:4:6:74,KR2b0007_234:8b:3:29:2,KR3a0026_011:45a:8:5:5,KR3a0059_027:48a:6:7:2,KR3a0105_089:20a:2:4:205,KR3j0020_002:2a:2:6:1,KR3j0082_008:12b:6:8:3,KR3j0185_008:58a:3:19:25,KR3k0008_048:25b:4:13:21,KR3k0013_897:18b:2:4:4,KR3k0030_326:2b:1:5:2,KR3k0055_158:18b:6:25:8,KR3k0056_131:54a:2:10:2,KR4d0180_002:5a:5:14:3,KR4d0254_002:2a:4:4:3,KR4d0254_002:27b:4:5:24,KR4d0254_007:29a:1:5:1,KR4d0254_019:17a:3:19:11,KR4d0302_009:13b:7:3:22,KR4e0164_014:9b:6:21:17,KR4e0225_004:9a:7:4:9,KR4e0245_012:25b:7:7:73,KR4f0006_004:20a:7:4:137,KR6d0225_023:0900b:7:4:2,KR6r0185_044:0261c:12:2:2,KR6r0185_046:0272a:8:8:3
而內自訟者也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_005-31a>¶	KR1h0004_005:17a:108:8:31,KR3j0082_008:12b:6:15:3,KR6d0225_023:0900b:7:11:2,KR6r0185_044:0261c:12:9:2,KR6r0185_046:0272a:8:15:3

# src: LY 05.28; tr. CH
